wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-Colonel Ernest Fitzroy Morrison-Bell,   (19 April 1871 – 20 October 1960) was a British soldier and parliamentarian.

response: The Liberal Unionist candidate Ernest Morrison-Bell, had lost the constituency by 1,283 votes in the previous general election.
The result was a victory for the Liberal Unionist candidate Ernest Morrison-Bell.

In 1908 Goschen married Marjorie Mary Blacker; they had two sons and three daughters (Grania, Mary Gwendoline, and Diana Marjorie). Both their sons were in the military: Brigadier Geoffrey William Goschen   (1911–88), who married Mary, daughter of Lt. Col. Ernest Morrison-Bell; and Captain John Arthur Goschen  (1918–41), who was killed in action in the Siege of Tobruk.
